item.title: Test Math Rendering
item.description: In this post, weâ€™ll test mathematical notation. Inline math: We can write an equation like $E = mc^2$ directly in the text. Display math: $$ \int_{-\infty}^{\infty} e^{-x^2},dx = \sqrt{\pi} $$ More complex expressions: $$ f(x) = \sum_{n=0}^{\infty} \frac{(-1)^n}{(2n+1)!} , x^{2n+1} $$ Enjoy testing math!
